title: Drawing, "Virgin Ascending with Concert of Angels", 1818
medium: Pen and ink, brush and brown ink, on paper
inscribed: Inscribed: 84, Bologna Innocenzo Imola; Verso: Locanda della spada Ravenna
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: On verso: view of city with wall and classical edifices; edifice and portico

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Virgin Ascending with Concert of Angels", 1818.
1818. Pen and ink, brush and brown ink, on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3544.
